references.paper_title: Bootstrap your own latent - A new approach to self-supervised learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel self-supervised learning approach that is highly influential in the field of deep clustering, providing a strong foundation for the methods explored in the current work.

references.paper_title: Momentum contrast for unsupervised visual representation learning
references.reason: This work presents Momentum Contrast, a highly effective method for unsupervised visual representation learning that significantly impacts contrastive clustering techniques, which are closely related to the research in this paper.
This paper introduces Contrastive Clustering, a seminal work directly related to the current research.  It is a foundation upon which this paper's interactive deep clustering approach builds.

references.paper_title: Twin Contrastive Learning for Online Clustering
references.reason: This paper focuses on online clustering, offering valuable insights into the challenges of dynamic data environments that relate to the current paper's enhancements to the process.

references.paper_title: SPICE: Semantic Pseudo-Labeling for Image Clustering
references.reason: This work directly addresses the limitations of existing deep clustering methods, especially concerning the handling of noisy pseudo-labels, providing a context for the current paper's improvements in accuracy.
